title: Muniya
plot: Inspired by a true story, a poor farmer finds out that his daughter has kidney failure. The operation needed to save her life will cost more than he could ever hope to pay. Will he be able to save his girl?
synopsis: Inspired by a true story, a poor farmer finds out that his daughter has kidney failure. The operation needed to save her life will cost more than he could ever hope to pay. Will he be able to save his girl?
